```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

### Load data

```{r}
bio= read.csv('data/shell-biometrics.csv')
str(bio)
```

### Explore data

```{r}
for (w in c('Length','Width','Height')) {
  arr=bio[[w]]
  cat(sprintf('%15s - mean: %f, sd: %f min: %f, max: %f\n', w, mean(arr), min(arr), max(arr),
              sd(arr)))
}
```

### Normality test

```{r}
library("ggpubr")
```

#### Length

```{r}
shapiro.test(bio$Length)
ggqqplot(bio$Length, ylab = "Length")
```

### Width

```{r}
shapiro.test(bio$Width)
ggqqplot(bio$Width, ylab = "Width")
```

### Height

```{r}
shapiro.test(bio$Height)
ggqqplot(bio$Height, ylab = "Height")
```
### Biomass Exploration
```{r}
for (w in c('Wet_Tissue_Weight','Dry_Shell_Weight')) {
  arr=bio[[w]]
  cat(sprintf('%15s - mean: %f, sd: %f min: %f, max: %f\n', w, mean(arr), sd(arr), min(arr), 
              max(arr)))
}
```
